msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
In frameworks, remove Adobe headers from all files except xml/mxml file types.  There are also a few .txt files that are license files that I didn't touch yet.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Temporary ASDoc updates for bug fix SDK-28907
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- Added new ToggleButtonSkinBase which subclasses ButtonBase. It uses the iconDisplay to hold the check box or radio circle.
- Added RadioButtonSkin and CheckBoxSkin which subclass ToggleButtonSkinBase and specifies the icons for the different states.
- Improved FXG skin creation logic in ButtonSkin.
SDK-27296 - Setting iconClass using setStyle does not work
Added logic to styleChanged and moved the iconClass logic to commitProperties
SDK-27295 - Button skin on 'up' state not consistent after clicking a button
Fixed up FXG skin creation logic
QE notes: CheckBox and RadioButton still need some visual tweaks to the FXG skins
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
- Added iconClass and labelPlacement styles to Button
- Switched from creating TextFields to using createInFontContext to create UITextFields
- Removed all of the TextFormat and style code. UITextField uses the style protochain to get the proper text styles.
- Replaced measure with the measure code from mx Button.
- Replaced updateDisplayList with the layoutContents code from mx Button.
- Fixed up the formatting to follow the framework conventions
Temporarily added ButtonLabelPlacement into the mobilecomponents swc. I more permanent solution is to move ButtonLabelPlacement.as from the mx to frameworks rsl.
This should fix the text style and sizing issues. LabelPlacement supports left, right, top and bottom.
The button icon support API is not final.
QE notes: This change along with revision 17195 will require new mobile Button mustella baselines
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Mirroring Window Gripper and DateField bug fixes
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-25719 - The gripper does not show up in an MX Window that is mirrored and using flex chrome

Added an mx_internal property to Button to track if the Button should modify the layoutDirection of its skins. MX Window and MX WindowedApplication both set this property to undefined. This is the only skin/icon in the halo and spark framework that inherits its layoutDirection from its parent. All others have layoutDirection of LTR.
http://bugs.adobe.com/jira/browse/SDK-25995 - DateField opens drop down on wrong side when layoutDirection = rtl
Added check if left edge of the dropDown exceeds the left screen bounds.
